If all the people has this transportation benefit, the financial system is not sustainable and the concerns regarding this 2 dollar trip have not been addressed.

If adults also have the right to get on a cross-district bus and get off after 1 or stations, I think this situation would be ubiquitous which is undesirable to both the government and bus corporations.

It would be better to support the development of bus companies as it is anyways a big part of public services while limiting their profit by reviewing their strategies of determining the price of a trip and educate the elderly regarding the consequence of exploiting their benefit. It is all about morality of the public at the end of the day.
